nodes.text: Lop was a female individual of a humanoid rabbit-like species who, during the Imperial Era, lived on a planet whose inhabitants were close to nature. The Galactic Empire occupied the planet, causing conflict with the planet's inhabitants. Lop, by that time an enslaved orphan, met Ochō, the daughter of a local powerful crime family, and the two formed a close bond.

Lop is a character who will feature in Geno Studio's Lop and Ochō, a short film that is part of the series Star Wars: Visions, set to release on Disney+. Director Yuki Igarashi wished to create a character that was symbolic and who was also a non-human being. Lop's design was inspired by Jaxxon, a character who originated in the classic Star Wars comic series.
